page.title: 05Housing.
page.content: There has been an improvement in housing in Stalybridge. All have baths and running hot water. Electricity has replaced gas for lighting in the home, though gas is extensively used for geating and cooking. A lot of terraced property has been knocked down. There are many different types of houses- terraced, town houses, detached and semi-detached, bungalows, council and private property. Some people dislike the high rates. There has been movement by people from house to house. Wherever people have moved, they have found their new neighbours friendly. But in moving to new houses, people have often found the rooms to be small. Some peolpe are unhappy to live on the hillsides, especislly with the harsh winter weather. Others like the view from the hills. Some feel more trees could have been planted.
